books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of decadence and excess, Gatsby explores the darker aspects of the American Dream.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A powerful story of racial injustice and the loss of innocence in the American South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel about surveillance, control, and the manipulation of truth.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A witty exploration of love, marriage, and social class in Georgian England.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The unforgettable tale of Bilbo Baggins' journey through Middle-earth.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A masterpiece of political intrigue and adventure on a desert planet.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A mystical story about following one's dreams and finding one's destiny.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A psychological thriller about a woman's act of violence against her husband.

books.title: Sapiens
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A brief history of humankind, from ancient civilizations to the present.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: A novel about all the choices that go into a life well lived.
